column1: # Description: This option creates the Community Site template and the Community Site for Geometrixx Communities
# Configuring the AEM Communities Publish Tunnel
# Making room for the future Community Site
# The following lines are creating the required Community Group templates (6.2 FP1 then 6.1/6.2 if not possible because of support for subgroups)

column6: This group template is used for the Communities demonstration sites
This group template is used for the Communities demonstration sites

column1: # The following lines are creating the Community Site Template (6.2 then 6.1 if 6.2 is not possible)

column6: Reference Site Template for Demos that contains one instance of each of the community functions
Reference Site Template for Demos that contains one instance of each of the community functions

column1: # The following lines are creating new Community Sites
# Updating a few Blog, Forums and QnA components with new settings (showing badges, allowing pinning)
# The following line is adding the ck.plugin.codesnippet entry to the clientlibs for the codesnippet plugin to work on this specific forum instance
# Setting the privileged member group on Blogs and Calendar
# The following lines are adding "activity components" to the trending page
# The following lines are adding the "leaderboard" components to the members page
# Assigning a few role based badges
# Updating the forum scoring rule to include the QNA post also
# Creating a new badging rule specifically for the Reference demo site
# Assigning the scoring and badging rules to the site
